problem_names: lemma msubst_pair [usubst]: "(P x y)\<lbrakk>(x, y) \<rightarrow> (e, f)\<^sub>u\<rbrakk> = (P x y)\<lbrakk>x \<rightarrow> e\<rbrakk>\<lbrakk>y \<rightarrow> f\<rbrakk>"
lemma msubst_uop [usubst]: "(uop f (v x))\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> = uop f ((v x)\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>)"
lemma msubst_uop_2 [usubst]: "(uop f (v x y))\<lbrakk>(x,y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> = uop f ((v x y)\<lbrakk>(x,y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>)"
lemma msubst_bop [usubst]: "(bop f (v x) (w x))\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> = bop f ((v x)\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>) ((w x)\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>)"
lemma msubst_bop_2 [usubst]: "(bop f (v x y) (w x y))\<lbrakk>(x,y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> = bop f ((v x y)\<lbrakk>(x,y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>) ((w x y)\<lbrakk>(x,y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>)"
lemma msubst_unrest [unrest]: "\<lbrakk> \<And> v. x \<sharp> P(v); x \<sharp> k \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x \<sharp> P(v)\<lbrakk>v\<rightarrow>k\<rbrakk>"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. msubst lit v = v
lemma msubst_pair [usubst]: "(P x y)\<lbrakk>(x, y) \<rightarrow> (e, f)\<^sub>u\<rbrakk> = (P x y)\<lbrakk>x \<rightarrow> e\<rbrakk>\<lbrakk>y \<rightarrow> f\<rbrakk>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P x y\<lbrakk>(x, y)\<rightarrow>(e, f)\<^sub>u\<rbrakk> =
    P x y\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>e\<rbrakk>\<lbrakk>y\<rightarrow>f\<rbrakk>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<guillemotleft>x\<guillemotright>\<lbrakk>(x,
    y)\<rightarrow>(u, v)\<^sub>u\<rbrakk> =
    u

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<guillemotleft>y\<guillemotright>\<lbrakk>(x,
    y)\<rightarrow>(u, v)\<^sub>u\<rbrakk> =
    v
lemma msubst_uop [usubst]: "(uop f (v x))\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> = uop f ((v x)\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. uop f (v x)\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> = uop f (msubst v u)
lemma msubst_uop_2 [usubst]: "(uop f (v x y))\<lbrakk>(x,y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> = uop f ((v x y)\<lbrakk>(x,y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. uop f (v x y)\<lbrakk>(x, y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> =
    uop f (v x y\<lbrakk>(x, y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>)
lemma msubst_bop [usubst]: "(bop f (v x) (w x))\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> = bop f ((v x)\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>) ((w x)\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bop f (v x) (w x)\<lbrakk>x\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> =
    bop f (msubst v u) (msubst w u)
lemma msubst_bop_2 [usubst]: "(bop f (v x y) (w x y))\<lbrakk>(x,y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> = bop f ((v x y)\<lbrakk>(x,y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>) ((w x y)\<lbrakk>(x,y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bop f (v x y) (w x y)\<lbrakk>(x, y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> =
    bop f (v x y\<lbrakk>(x, y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>)
     (w x y\<lbrakk>(x, y)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk>)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x\<lbrakk>(y, z)\<rightarrow>u\<rbrakk> = x
lemma msubst_unrest [unrest]: "\<lbrakk> \<And> v. x \<sharp> P(v); x \<sharp> k \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x \<sharp> P(v)\<lbrakk>v\<rightarrow>k\<rbrakk>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<And>v. x \<sharp> P v; x \<sharp> k\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<sharp> msubst P k
